short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insightfly is a chrome extension that allows you to generate a  insights and summaries of a youtube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly extract key insights from YouTube videos with AI. Save time and get straight to the essential content, from AI to personal growth and more. Install now for concise understanding!

💡 Absorb the fast-paced world of AI  without missing a beat!
👀 Explore those podcasts you've been meaning to get around to from your backlog.
⚡ Get key insights and summaries in just few seconds flat.
🌐 From business to personal development, stay ahead with up-to-the-minute insights.

Advantages:
✅ Time-Efficient – Get straight to the heart of the matter quickly.
✅ Selective – Don't waste your precious time on videos that won't serve you.

Content:
🎙 Podcasts and interviews: Hear from experts and enthusiasts, and get their insights distilled.
📺 News reports: Stay updated on the latest happenings around the globe.
📱 Product reviews: Get clear, concise opinions on the latest gadgets and software.
🙇🏻‍♀️ Educational videos: Learn something new every day without wasting a moment.
🛠 Tutorials: Hone your skills with concise, clear instructions, Political Speches summarized..
 -- How to use -- 
1. Open the webpage 
2. Click the 'Summarise' button on the right panel above of the video
3. Get the AI-generated summary in seconds!
